title: BBQ grilling area, Spa, Fitness Center
posting_body: At Parc Medallion Apartments, you can enjoy a comfortable lifestyle and be part of the close-knit Union City neighborhood.

From its tranquil, landscaped grounds to its inviting interiors, this neighborly community is ready to welcome you home, where scenic walkways guide you alongside professional landscaping, past a sparkling swimming pool and to our expansive, garden-style apartments.
Step inside a one or two bedroom apartment home and experience that warm feeling delivered by stylish finishes combined with smart, practical conveniences.
This is where you should be!
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $500 pet deposit per animal.
There is a weight limit of 35lbs per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Check out our virtual tour on our website at <URL>
Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
